answers.answer: Forces all background threads to terminate
Triggers garbage collection but does not guarantee immediate memory release
Deletes all objects marked for finalization

Rendering.title: Which keyword prevents a class from being inherited?
Rendering.short_title: Which keyword prevents a class from being inherited?

C#.title: What is the difference between ref and out in C#?
C#.short_title: What is the difference between ref and out in C#?

answers.answer: out requires initialization before use, ref does not
ref requires initialization before being passed to a method, while out does not
ref can only be used with reference types
